00015 BusInterfaceEditor::BusInterfaceEditor(LibraryInterface* libHandler,
00016                                                                            QSharedPointer<Component> component, 
00017                                                                            void* dataPointer, 
00018                                                                            QWidget *parent): 
00019 ItemEditor(component, parent),
00020 busif_(),
00021 tabs_(this), 
00022 general_(libHandler, dataPointer, &tabs_), 
00023 portmaps_(libHandler, component, dataPointer, &tabs_), 
00024 interfaceMode_(libHandler, &general_, component, dataPointer, &tabs_), 
00025 parameters_(dataPointer, &tabs_) {
00026 
00027         Q_ASSERT_X(component, "BusInterfaceEditor constructor",
00028                 "Null Component-pointer given as parameter");
00029         Q_ASSERT_X(dataPointer, "BusInterfaceEditor constructor",
00030                 "Null dataPointer given as parameter");
00031 
00032         busif_ = static_cast<BusInterface*>(dataPointer);
00033 
00034         QHBoxLayout* layout = new QHBoxLayout(this);
00035         layout->addWidget(&tabs_);
00036 
00037         tabs_.addTab(&general_, tr("General"));
00038         tabs_.addTab(&interfaceMode_, tr("Interface mode"));
00039         tabs_.addTab(&portmaps_, tr("Port maps"));
00040         tabs_.addTab(&parameters_, tr("Parameters"));
00041 
00042         general_.restoreChanges();
00043         portmaps_.restoreChanges();
00044         interfaceMode_.restoreChanges();
00045         parameters_.restoreChanges();
00046 
00047         connect(&portmaps_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00048                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00049         connect(&portmaps_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00050                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00051         connect(&portmaps_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00052                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00053 
00054         connect(&general_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00055                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00056         connect(&general_, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)),
00057                 this, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00058         connect(&general_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00059                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00060         connect(&general_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00061                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00062 
00063         connect(&interfaceMode_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00064                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00065         connect(&interfaceMode_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00066                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00067         connect(&interfaceMode_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00068                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00069 
00070         connect(&parameters_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00071                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00072         connect(&parameters_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00073                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00074         connect(&parameters_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00075                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00076 
00077         connect(&tabs_, SIGNAL(currentChanged(int)),
00078                 this, SLOT(onTabChange(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00079 }
00080 
00081 BusInterfaceEditor::~BusInterfaceEditor() {
00082         tabs_.disconnect();
00083 }
00084 
00085 bool BusInterfaceEditor::isValid() const {
00086         
00087         if (!general_.isValid())
00088                 return false;
00089         else if (!portmaps_.isValid())
00090                 return false;
00091         else if (!interfaceMode_.isValid())
00092                 return false;
00093         else if (!parameters_.isValid())
00094                 return false;
00095 
00096         // all was fine
00097         return true;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void BusInterfaceEditor::removeModel() {
00101         component()->removeBusInterface(busif_);
00102 }
00103 
00104 void BusInterfaceEditor::onTabChange( int index ) {
00105 
00106         // if port maps tab is selected
00107         if (index == 2) {
00108                 // update the abstraction type
00109                 portmaps_.setAbsType(general_.getAbsType(), interfaceMode_.getInterfaceMode());
00110         }
00111 }
00112 
00113 void BusInterfaceEditor::makeChanges() {
00114         general_.applyChanges();
00115         portmaps_.applyChanges();
00116         interfaceMode_.applyChanges();
00117         parameters_.applyChanges();
00118 
00119         component()->updateBusInterface(busif_);
00120 }
